meta.description: Scroll-stopping ad creative designed for performance across platforms — from UGC-style to animated motion ads.

hero.headline: Ad creative that performs.
hero.subheadline: From thumb-stopping short-form to long-form video — creative engineered for clicks and conversions.

benefits.text: Creative templates proven to lift CTR and lower CPA.
Rapid turnarounds for iterating ads across platforms.
Data-led creative: testing variants connected to performance metrics.

included: Static ads, animated video (6–60s), UGC-style verticals, thumbnail & caption tests.
Creative testing frameworks and winner promotion flows.
Full production or rapid-retainer creative supply.

howItWorks.title: Scale
howItWorks.description: Push winning variants, adjust messaging to audience segments.

faq.question: Which platforms do you support?
faq.answer: All major platforms — Meta, TikTok, YouTube, LinkedIn — plus programmatic.

faq.question: Can you produce local language variants?
faq.answer: Yes — multilingual creative & caption localization available.

faq.question: How do you measure creative success?
faq.answer: CTR, video watch rate, landing conversion, and post-click revenue attribution.

faq.question: Can you match our brand guidelines?
faq.answer: Yes — we adapt to brand style guides and provide governance docs.
